mapper.select: select * from privilege where privilegeid > 0 and parentid = 0 and subsystem = 0 order by sequence
select * from privilege where privilegeid > 0 and parentid = 0 and subsystem = 1 order by sequence
select * from privilege where privilegeid > 0 and parentid = 0 and subsystem = 2 order by sequence
select * from privilege where privilegeid > 0 and parentid = #{id} order by sequence

select p.* from privilege p, staffprivilege sp where p.privilegeid = sp.privilegeid and sp.staffid = #{staffid} union select p.* from privilege p, roleprivilege rp, staffrole sr where p.privilegeid = rp.privilegeid and rp.roleid = sr.roleid and sr.staffid = #{staffid}
